mapper.insert: insert into alcohol (type_kor, type_eng, name_kor, name_eng, abv, img_path, content) values (#{type_kor}, #{type_eng}, #{name_kor}, #{name_eng}, #{abv}, #{img_path}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from alcohol where type_kor like concat('%', #{searchtxt}, '%') or type_eng like concat('%', #{searchtxt}, '%') or name_kor like concat('%', #{searchtxt}, '%') or name_eng like concat('%', #{searchtxt}, '%')
select pk_alcohol from alcohol where name_kor like #{name} or name_eng like #{name}
